title: [RoadMap] Open3D for Paddle backend
body:
### Checklist

- [x] I have searched for [similar issues](https://github.com/isl-org/Open3D/issues).
- [x] For Python issues, I have tested with the [latest development wheel](https://www.open3d.org/docs/latest/getting_started.html#development-version-pip).
- [x] I have checked the [release documentation](https://www.open3d.org/docs/release/) and the [latest documentation](https://www.open3d.org/docs/latest/) (for `main` branch).

### Proposed new feature or change

# RoadMap

## Part 1
- [x]  完成Paddle backend集成，完成 `FixedRadiusSearch` 相关代码合入：https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/1

## Part 2
- [x]  完成 misc 下相关代码合入: https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/3
- [x]  完成 pointnet 和 pvcnn 下相关代码合入: https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/5
- [x]  完成 contiguous_conv 下相关代码合入: https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/6
- [x]  完成 sparse_conv 下相关代码合入:  https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/7

## Part 3
- [x] 完成相关文档修改: https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/9 https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/13
- [x] 协助完成CI接入: https://github.com/PFCCLab/Open3D/pull/12

cc @Woodman3 @HydrogenSulfate 

### References

_No response_

### Additional information
